title: Pilot
synop: A strangely eccentric genius scientist and inventor moves into the home of his daughter and her family and begins to strongly influence his young grandson.

title: Lawnmower Dog
synop: Rick helps Jerry out with the dog.

title: Anatomy Park
synop: It's Christmas. Rick shrinks Morty, injecting him into a homeless man to save Anatomy Park. Jerry tries to have a Christmas free of electronic devices, but regrets his decision when his parents introduce him to their new friend.

title: M. Night Shaym-Aliens!
synop: Rick and Morty try to get to the bottom of a mystery.

title: Meeseeks and Destroy
synop: Rick provides the family with a solution to their problems, freeing him up to go on an adventure led by Morty.

title: Rick Potion #9
synop: After Rick gives Morty a love potion for a school dance, things quickly spiral out of control when the serum splices with the flu - causing it to spread. Rick and Morty scramble to cure the crisis, making matters worse in the process.

title: Raising Gazorpazorp
synop: Morty becomes a father to an alien baby, while Rick and Summer get trapped in a dangerous dimension.

title: Rixty Minutes
synop: Rick hooks up the family's TV with interdimensional cable, allowing them to watch infinite TV from across the multiverse.

title: Something Ricked This Way Comes
synop: Summer gets a job at a pawn shop owned by the devil. Jerry helps Morty with his science fair project.

title: Close Rick-counters of the Rick Kind
synop: Rick, falsely blamed for Murder by the council of Ricks, begins a cross-dimensional pursuit with the authorities while attempting to prove his innocence.

title: Ricksy Business
synop: Beth and Jerry head for an iceberg of a date leaving Rick in charge. Morty doesn't get to go on any more adventures if the house isn't in the same condition when they get back.
